body_html:
There was an issue with 1.8 when a specific initialization order was required:

Quoting @boriskovalev:

  1. Need to run by strict sequence when worker/PS with higher index is started first.
    Example: We run 2 PS + 2 Workers. So, launch sequence must be PS1->PS0->W1->W0.

Can you try it?
body_text:
There was an issue with 1.8 when a specific initialization order was required:
Quoting @boriskovalev:


Need to run by strict sequence when worker/PS with higher index is started first.
Example: We run 2 PS + 2 Workers.  So, launch sequence must be PS1->PS0->W1->W0.


Can you try it?
body:
There was an issue with 1.8 when a specific initialization order was required:

Quoting @boriskovalev:
> 1.	Need to run by strict sequence when worker/PS with higher index is started first.
> Example: We run 2 PS + 2 Workers.  So, launch sequence must be PS1->PS0->W1->W0.

Can you try it?
